testcase.name: verify_valid_login_TC01
testcase.system-out: Given user should on login page.............................................passed When user enters valid credentials and click on login button................passed Then user should be navigated to home page..................................passed And user can validate logout link...........................................passed

testcase.name: verify_Invalid_login_TC02
testcase.system-out: Given user should on login page.............................................passed When user enters invalid credentials and click on login button..............passed Then user should be navigated to login page.................................passed And user can validate error message.........................................passed
